section.name: Bluefin Support Notes
section.p: Bluefin is built using IBMJDK 6 and is also known to be compatible with the following JDKs:
Bluefin is reported to work on the following operating systems:
Bluefin is compatible with TestNG version 6.8 or above and maven 2.x.
Here is a list of browsers and versions support by Bluefin:

ul.li: iPhone device /simulator. Refer link for details
Android simulator. Refer link for details.

section.p: Here is a list of current known issues/limitations:

ul.li: Safari is not supported, since WebDriver doesn't support Safari yet.
